description: Chillarmy took the badge case that Bianca was delivering to Ash because it was dirty. He is a very tidy and smart Pok√©mon. Bianca instantly fell in love with the Chillarmy and decided she wanted to get it. She attempted to capture it by setting traps but it wasn`t until she took out the monster ball to catch it that Chillarmy noticed was dirty and ended up capturing itself.
name: Chillarmy (Bel)
